entity1.name: Astronaut
entity1.description: The team of individuals working together on a mission or project.;;;Professionals trained to travel and perform tasks in space.;;;A person trained to travel in a spacecraft.;;;A person trained to travel in a spacecraft and conduct activities in space.;;;Individuals trained to travel and work in space, often conducting scientific research or maintenance tasks on spacecraft.;;;The group of individuals working and living on the space station.;;;Professional space travelers who work on spacecraft and conduct scientific research in space.;;;A collective term for all individuals working together on a specific task or mission, such as on a ship, aircraft, or space station.;;;A person trained to travel in a spacecraft or work in space.;;;Professionals trained to travel and work in space.;;;Individuals trained to travel and work in space, often responsible for conducting scientific experiments and maintaining spacecraft.;;;Fellow astronauts or team members with whom the astronauts share their living and working environment in space.;;;Professional space travelers who are trained to operate spacecraft and perform tasks in outer space.;;;A person trained to travel in a spacecraft and work in space.;;;A person trained to travel in a spacecraft and conduct scientific research or other tasks in space.;;;Individuals trained to travel and work in space.
entity1.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut14;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut23;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut10;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut12;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut15;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut20;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut4;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut2;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut11;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut7;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut5;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut8;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut16;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut1;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut6;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut25;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut13;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut24;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut22;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut3;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut18

entity2.name: Space Exploration
entity2.description: Extended periods spent in outer space, typically involving astronauts or cosmonauts on spacecraft for prolonged durations.;;;The discovery and exploration of outer space, including the study of celestial bodies and phenomena that originate outside Earth's atmosphere.
entity2.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut1;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut17

entity3.name: Universe
entity3.description: All of space and time and their contents, including planets, stars, galaxies, and all other forms of matter and energy.
entity3.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut1

entity6.name: space station
entity6.description: A large spacecraft that remains in orbit around Earth for an extended period, serving as a base for scientific research and other activities.;;;A large spacecraft that remains in orbit around Earth for an extended period, serving as a research laboratory and living quarters for astronauts.;;;A large spacecraft designed for long-term human habitation in orbit around Earth or other celestial bodies.;;;A large spacecraft in low Earth orbit used for scientific research and experiments.
entity6.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut5;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut9;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut3;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut15

entity8.name: space
entity8.description: The boundless, three-dimensional expanse in which all matter is contained and moves.
entity8.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut4

entity11.name: morning briefing
entity11.description: A regular meeting held in the morning to discuss daily activities and updates.
entity11.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut6

entity13.name: mission control
entity13.description: A ground-based facility responsible for monitoring and directing space missions.;;;A facility or team responsible for monitoring and directing space missions.
entity13.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut6;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut19

entity18.name: scientific research
entity18.description: Systematic investigation into and study of materials, structures, organisms, or phenomena to discover facts or principles.
entity18.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut10

entity19.name: station's systems or equipment
entity19.description: The various operational components of a space station, including life support, power generation, and communication systems.;;;The various mechanical, electrical, and life support systems that are part of a space station, essential for its operation and the safety of its crew.
entity19.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut14;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut10

entity21.name: exercise
entity21.description: Physical activity performed to maintain or improve health and fitness.
entity21.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut11

entity22.name: microgravity
entity22.description: A condition of very low gravity, such as that experienced in space.
entity22.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut12

entity23.name: human body
entity23.description: The physical structure and function of a human being.
entity23.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut12

entity26.name: treadmills
entity26.description: Exercise machines used for walking or running while staying in one place.
entity26.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut13

entity27.name: resistance machines
entity27.description: Exercise equipment designed to provide resistance against muscle movement, often used for strength training.
entity27.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut13

entity29.name: living quarters
entity29.description: A designated area within a spacecraft where astronauts can rest and sleep.;;;The area within a spacecraft or space station where crew members reside and perform daily activities.
entity29.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut14;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut20

entity35.name: Earth
entity35.description: The third planet from the Sun, where humans live and which is often visible to astronauts as a viewable object from space.;;;The third planet from the Sun, where humans live and which is often observed from space for its beauty and scientific value.
entity35.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut16;;;A Day in the Life of an Astronaut22

entity36.name: downtime
entity36.description: Periods of rest or inactivity, especially during work or missions.
entity36.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut17

entity37.name: morale
entity37.description: A state of psychological and emotional health characterized by good mental functioning and positive feelings.;;;The mental and emotional condition (of a person) with regard to confidence, hopefulness, and enthusiasm.
entity37.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut17

entity44.name: sleeping bags
entity44.description: Bags designed for sleeping, used by astronauts to stay in place while they sleep in zero gravity conditions.
entity44.chunkid: A Day in the Life of an Astronaut20
